text: The application for issuance or renewal of a brew pub permit shall include:
historical:
D.C. Law 13-298 amended and enacted into law Title 25 of the District of Columbia Official Code.

Legislative History of Laws

For D.C. Law 13-298, see notes following ยง 25-101.

DC CODE ยง 25-407

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: A copy of the applicant's restaurant or tavern license, or a copy of the pending application for a license; and
A map showing the relation of the restaurant or tavern to the premises to be used to brew malt beverages.
